special_text:
Whenever you amass any amount, put a loyalty counters on Lahabrea.
[0]: You lose 1 life and amass 1. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't have one, create a 0/0 black Army creature token first.)[/i]
[-X]: Amass X. Then if X is 14 or more, you control each opponent during their next turn. [i](You see all cards that player could see and make all decisions for the player.)[/i]
